name: Famous Scientists
description: Learn about the great minds that have shaped the field of science.

flashcards.question: Who developed the theory of general relativity?
Who is known for the laws of motion?
Who discovered the structure of DNA?
Who is known for the periodic table?
Who proposed the theory of evolution?
Who is known for the uncertainty principle?
Who is the father of modern chemistry?
Who is known for the Bohr model?
